channel.title: company strategy on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in company strategy on FinanClub

item.title: NYCB
item.description: score:1065 Chances: Highlighting high-yield dividend stocks with rapid growth, where UWM Holdings ranks as a leading mortgage lender. Announcing the hiring of Michele Celestino as EVP and Head of Commercial and Private Banking, Southeast at Flagstar Bank, N.A., a subsidiary of NYCB. Announcing the successful completion of Flagstar Bank’s MortgageTech Accelerator program by fintech graduates.

item.title: PBR-A
item.description: score:870 Chances: Highlighting insights on Petrobras alongside other companies like Wayfair, UPS, and Six Flags. Clarifying that Petrobras does not intend to turn petrochemical producer Braskem into a government-controlled firm. Noting Petrobras’ major shareholder status in Braskem and its contractual rights in case of a potential sale by Novonor.
